articles.description: ARK Autonomous Technology & Robotics ETF and ARK Space & Defense Innovation ETF were among the best-performing ETFs in 2025.

articles.title: Aeva, Nvidia to integrate 4D LiDAR within Nvidia Drive Hyperion
articles.description: Aeva (AEVA) announced that its Frequency Modulated Continuous Wave 4D LiDAR technology has been selected for the NVIDIA (NVDA) DRIVE Hyperion au...
articles.content: Aeva (AEVA) announced that its Frequency Modulated Continuous Wave 4D LiDAR technology has been selected for the NVIDIA (NVDA) DRIVE Hyperion autonomous vehicle reference platform. The integration marks a significant milestone for Aeva as its role ex... [680 chars]

articles.title: Indore News: IIT Indore Hosts National Technical Hindi Seminar
articles.description: The primary objective of Abhyuday–3 is to encourage effective use of Hindi in higher education, science, technology, research, and administration. It also aims to promote standardization of technical terminology and facilitate communication of innovation and research outcomes in Hindi. The seminar seeks to make Technical Hindi more employment-oriented.
articles.content:
Indore (Madhya Pradesh): The Indian Institute of Technology Indore on Monday inaugurated a two-day National Technical Hindi Seminar, Abhyuday–3, dedicated to promotion, propagation and strengthening of Technical Hindi.
The seminar is being jointly or... [2800 chars]

articles.title: Intel announces Core Ultra Series 3 built on Intel 18A technology
articles.description: At CES 2026, Intel unveiled the Core Ultra Series 3, an AI PC platform built with 18A technology that Intel claims is best process globally.
articles.content:
At CES 2026, Intel unveiled the Core Ultra Series 3, the first AI PC platform built with 18A technology, which Intel says is the best process in the world.
The Series 3 will offer a new class of Intel Core Ultra X9 and X7 processors, according to the... [1004 chars]

articles.title: Nvidia unveils 'reasoning' AI technology for self-driving cars
articles.description: Nvidia is partnering with Mercedes-Benz to launch a driverless car powered by its 'Alpamayo' tech
articles.content:
Nvidia boss Jensen Huang on Monday announced Alpamayo, a tech platform the company says will help self-driving cars think like humans.
"Alpamayo brings reasoning to autonomous vehicles, allowing them to think through rare scenarios, drive safely in c... [2013 chars]
